name: Tap To Da Beat
description:
We proudly present the freshest rhythm game Tap To Da Beat! Test your eye-hand coordination and improve your rhythm skills!

Play your favorite genre of songs, HipHop, EDM, house, Chillhop, Trap songs and more.

Super easy to play, just tap left&right screen to as the notes reach DJ table.

Don't forget to show some love for the artists who made these beautiful melodies and tunes!

How to play:
Tap left/right of the screen to hit notes on the left/right side
Tap and hold to hit long notes

Follow us on socials for the latest news and updates:
https://twitter.com/RHYTHMMMM1
https://www.instagram.com/taptodabeat
